title: Royal Allegiance Esports looking for team members for competitive play
body:
Royal Allegiance Esports are on the lookout for serious players to come together and break into the competitive scene. We are looking for highly skilled and motivated players to join our roster in the pursuit of OPL in 2017. All positions available.

We will also be competing in the Oceanic Open Ladder (OOL) tournament.
Player prerequisites:
-Must have stable Internet connection 
-Must have voice comms
-Must be available to play thursday 7pm - 10Aest and Saturday and Sundays 11am-4pm AEST as these are the times tournaments will be played.
-Preferably d4+ but will consider high plat

Please fill out the above form to apply

replies.body:
Greetings Hostility,

The team previously known as "Dome City" are currently disbanded due to lack of funding and sponsorship. We are very interested in reforming as a team and aiming for the TOP of OCE under your new team "Royal Allegiance".

You may or may not have heard of the notorious DC crew, but our achievements speak for themselves:

-First place UoA Gold and under tournament
-First place New Zealand gold and under tournament
-3rd place in group stages of OCE gold and under tournament

With this extensive tournament experience behind us, we believe that we have a strong chance to compete for the OPL title in our very first split.

Please contact me, preferably by sending a raven with contracts ready to be signed.

Yours sincerely,
Kento, DC Captain

Heya, am looking for a committed team to join.

Add me and we can discuss further?

Ign: star
if i can get from s3 to diamond can i adc for this team?

Their social links

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RAeSports/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/i/notifications?lang=en
Hey guys, just letting you know since you are starting at the 2017 Split 1 OOL, there is no possibility of you making it into the 2017 OPL (Split 2), only the 2017 OCS.
I think he meant it as their main goal. But yea even tho you qualify for ocs/ opl at the end of split two, its for the next years regular split you qualify for play.
Now we just need Pussayeating 101 Back :D
